title: Huly Development Conventions
body_html:
Huly Development Conventions

Naming

  • Plugin IDs: server-{feature} (e.g., server-webhook)
  • Resource packages: {feature}-resources
  • Model classes: T{ClassName}

Imports Order

  1. Node built-ins
  2. External deps
  3. Huly core packages
  4. Huly plugin packages
  5. Local modules

Structure

src/
├─ index.ts
├─ triggers.ts
├─ api.ts
├─ services/
└─ utils/

Error Handling

  • Log with context; don’t crash triggers
  • Map errors to 4xx/5xx in API
